THIRD-PARTY SOFTWARE NOTICES AND INFORMATION

PyCAT relies on third-party software for many functionalities. Their respective 
licence terms can be found at the links below:

1. **aicsimageio**
   - License: MIT License
   - License text: https://github.com/AllenCellModeling/aicsimageio/blob/main/LICENSE

2. **cellpose**
   - License: BSD-3-Clause License
   - License text: https://github.com/MouseLand/cellpose/blob/master/LICENSE

3. **matplotlib**
   - License: PSF License (Python Software Foundation License)
   - License text: https://github.com/matplotlib/matplotlib/blob/main/LICENSE

4. **napari**
   - License: BSD-3-Clause License
   - License text: https://github.com/napari/napari/blob/main/LICENSE

5. **numpy**
   - License: BSD-3-Clause License
   - License text: https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/main/LICENSE.txt

6. **opencv-python-headless**
   - License: MIT License
   - License text: https://github.com/skvark/opencv-python/blob/master/LICENSE

7. **pandas**
   - License: BSD-3-Clause License
   - License text: https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/main/LICENSE

   - License: MIT License
   - License text: https://github.com/samuelcolvin/pydantic/blob/master/LICENSE
